page.title: 02A Day in the Life of a Child
page.content: This is a typical day of an 11 year old child who lives in the block. The child we talked to lives in {Charlton {Hill. }She gets up at 7.30 and has a breakfast of cereal and a cup of tea. She has a wash and then watches TV while waiting for the school minibus. The journey to school is 5 miles along country lanes to Buildwas School. The school is small with 2 classes for the 40 children. During the day she will do some work on Maths, English, Art and a topic like snails.She may also work on the school computer.She has dinner at school which may consist of a choice between sausages and fish fingers, chips and baked beans. Pudding may be ice cream or apple pie. School ends at 3.15 and she goes home on the minibus. In the evening she may watch TV or play in the garden with her dog.
